m_szDocTitle: Elon Musk Demonstrates 3D Design With Hand Gestures (Video)
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Elon Musk Demonstrates 3D Design With Hand Gestures (Video) Originally published on Gas2 . By Christopher DeMorro. Industrialist Elon Musk has been compared to Ironman/Tony Stark for his work on the technology of the future. While we best know Musk for his work with Tesla Motors and electric cars andÂ  teasing us with his hyperloop design , his other pet project is SpaceX, a private attempt to kickstart the space industry.
